description: Non-material amendment to planning permission reference 18/3400/S73 dated 02/08/2018 for `Variation of condition 2 (Plans Numbers) pursuant to APP/N5090/W/17/3192008 dated 10/04/18 planning ref 17/3678/FUL for `Demolition of existing buildings. Erection of a three-storey building including a (D1 use) unit at ground floor level. Basement level car parking, plant housing and individual storage units to accommodate 9no self-contained flats at ground, first and second floor levels with associated Juliet balconies to elevations and roof terrace. Associated hard and soft landscaping, amenity space, cycle storage and refuse and recycling storage. Amendments include reduction in basement footprint, addition of two parking bays, utility room added to all 3 bed unit kitchens, swing door changed to sliding doors on to garden in all 3 bed units, D1 unit reoriented to allow for revised parking layout, bike store reconfigured to allow for 18 cycles, addition of a general store by entrance hall.  First and second floor minor changes to partition walls, relocation of riser in relation to new stair configuration at basement, new roof access hatch, new smoke vent and relocation of entrance door to flat 205. Removal of roof terrace, photovoltaic panel relocated` Amendment to include removal of the bathroom window and addition of obscure glazed kitchen window to flat 205
